entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
..TORNADO WATCH 204 IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON

entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS WITH THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE WITH DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 70
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT
